SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.service

Class SongSearchDeezerImpl

SongSearchService
@Service public class SongSearchDeezerImpl extends Object implements SongSearchService
Implementation of the SongSearchService Interface that uses the Deezer API to search for songs.

  • Method Details

    • externalSearchForSongs

      @Transactional public Set<Song> externalSearchForSongs(String songSearch, String artistSearch)
      Searches for songs related to given query. Using the Deezer API, this searches for anything related to the query on Deezer. The API returns a HttpResponse, and this function takes the body of it, and parses the data into song objects, and returns a set of songs found related to the query. The method takes two parameters, the name of the song and the name of the artist. At least one of them needs to be a non-empty string for the search to be executed.

      If songs are found related to the given params, they are put into a tree set, which is a sorted set. The set is sorted by the JaroWinklerDistance the song name or artist name is from the target song name or artist name. If the distance is the same, it compares the Deezer ID of each song, which is always unique.

      Specified by:
      externalSearchForSongs in interface SongSearchService
      Parameters:
      songSearch - Name of song to search for (Target song name)
      artistSearch - Name of artist to search for (Target artist name)
      Returns:
      Set of songs related to query, sorted either by song name or artist name. If a song name was passed, sorted by song name. If just an artist name was passed, sorted by artist
      See Also:
      • TreeSet
      • JaroWinklerDistance

    • getSongPreview

      public String getSongPreview(Long deezerID)
      Gets the link to the preview of the song with the given id. Deezer makes some links secure, and makes them expire after a day, so we always have to reload the link to preview the song. We couldn't done a better implementation with more time, but this was a last minute fix.
      Specified by:
      getSongPreview in interface SongSearchService
      Parameters:
      deezerID - ID to get link for
      Returns:
      String of url

    • isValidQuery

      public boolean isValidQuery(String query)
      Checks if the given query is valid.

      A query is valid if:

      • It's not null
      • It's not empty
      • It's length is greater than MIN_QUERY_LENGTH
      • It's length is less than MAX_QUERY_LENGTH

      Parameters:
      query - Query to check if valid
      Returns:
      true if query is valid, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • MAX_QUERY_LENGTH
      • MIN_QUERY_LENGTH
